title: Promontory Release Cadence Acceleration
summary: Overhauled CI/CD and environment readiness to shrink release cycles from quarterly to weekly.
problem: Three-month release cycles with brittle environments blocked rapid delivery and feedback.
approach: Rebuilt pipelines, tightened promotion quality gates, uplifted Kubernetes dev clusters, and standardized Gradle builds to remove drift.
impact: Teams moved from quarterly to weekly releases with higher confidence and predictable rollouts.
